title: Maria of the Pueblos
brief_description: Centres on the life of Maria Martinez, who is probably the world’s most successful Indian potter. Tells how Maria accidentally rediscovered the secret of recreating iridescent black pottery, and unselfishly shard it to life her village out of poverty.
